alert.note: Alert for Eastern Magic Valley; Raft River Region; Southern Hills, Albion Mountains (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued March 19 at 8:55PM MDT until March 20 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM TO 9 PM MDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...West winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 60 mph expected. Sustained winds up to 45 mph and gusts over 65 mph are possible across the higher elevations. * WHERE...Burley, Rupert, Heyburn, Oakley, Albion, Almo, Malta, Holbrook and Yale. This includes I 84 from the Utah border to the I 86 interchange. * WHEN...From 4 AM to 9 PM MDT Sunday. The strongest winds will be from around sunrise through early afternoon. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds are possible along with possible power outages. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Pockets of blowing dust are also possible where any fields might have been plowed recently.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Magic Valley; Raft River Region; Southern Hills, Albion Mountains
